# IOResourceMatch

**Property List Key**

One or more system-specific or device-specific resources that your driver requires.

## Discussion

The value of this key is a string or an array of strings. Each string contains the name of a resource that must be published in the global resource list before the system loads the driver. For example, specify `IOBSD` to prevent the system from loading your driver until after the BSD kernel is available.

To access the list of global resources, call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/ioservice/1532617-getresourceservice] method of [https://developer.apple.com/documentation/kernel/ioservice-1g]. To publish custom resources from your driver, call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/ioservice/1532848-publishresource] method.

## Advanced Match Criteria

- **IOPropertyMatch**: The device-specific keys the system must match in order to use your driver.
- **IONameMatch**: One or more strings that contain the names of possible provider objects in the system registry.
- **IOParentMatch**
- **IOPathMatch**
- **IOMatchCategory**
